1.content: Here will be a list of Characters pick, one that you'd be interested in and enjoy the story.
1.title: Choosing characters

11.content:
Hi, This is Shane Matthews, let me tell a bit about myself, you see I got a split personality. Both that have to do with my stink fetish, also I personality like to switch by itself like it has a mind of its own, lets say I could be sitting at a park bench and a innocent women sit near me and lets off a small SBD I'm in my normal personality having a little whiff without her noticing, the next thing I know. I have my nose in her butt,

Personality: See this is what I'm scared about if I'm in this personality. Down below is the list of body smells and bodily functions smells and how I react to them;

- Belching: If I get a whiff of a belch I'll stick my nose into their mouth and inhale the belch.

So there you have it my weird life now pick a quest for me so we can start.
11.title: Shane Matthews

142.title: Amy's quest

info.brief_description: Multiple characters in their own stinky quest.
info.description:
This story follows several people in their quest, hoping to survive, some are good some are just plain nightmares.

Rules to making a chapter.
1. Swearing allowed no limit.
2. No discrimination or racist or anything to do with religion.
3. Any fetishes are allowed.
4. Make sure to include plenty of stinks (Belching/bad breath/BO/feet stink/farting etc.)
5. Make sure chapters are least 1 Paragraph long.
6. Crossovers are allowed.
7. Deaths can happen, but no gory deaths.
8. Only Anal Vore allowed, mouth can be allowed if permission but they can't die from it.
9. You can create your own stories for your own characters if you'd like.
10. Celebrity video games or Anime character can be major characters in their own stories or just a minor/cameo appearances.

500 GPs for really good chapters if I have some.
